Support 1Screen

If you are a fan of 1Screen and want to show some support we suggest upgrading to Supporter Status!

With Supporter Status you get access to some handy features like:

  • Unlimited campaign slots
  • Add images to your campaigns
  • Exclusive commands
  • Eternal love

As 1Screen continues development we'll add in new Supporter features.
